replies.body:
I agree that it's hard to catch the team griefers in action.  I don't want to record all the time since it effects my fps. Plus, a screen shot doesn't prove anything.

Here are some suggestions:
1. Team with players you know won't steal (gold, emerald, diamond)
2. Cook iron in a private, secluded location (less traffic)
3. Don't cook it all at once (one or two pieces at a time using multiple furnaces)
4. Get more iron than you'll need (30+ when possible)
5. Announce to all players that someone griefed you and usually that person will get killed soon after drop (revenge is sweet)
6. Always do /report (mods will come if available)

Griefers stink.
